title.narrative: By 2021, the root causes of armed conflict, instability and

description.narrative: By 2021, the root causes of armed conflict, instability and irregular migration in Burundi are significantly reduced, and youth and communities most at risk of being affected or engaging in violent conflict are equipped to embrace peaceful coexistence
